message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone like you.  Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,350,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in the product, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $1,200,000?
Bob, I understand your position on the budget. I've tried to price this fairly,  How about we meet in the middle at $1,275,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1,225,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget while still reflecting the value of the item.

Bob, I'm serious about getting this done and I appreciate your willingness to work with me.  My absolute floor is $1,250,000. I'm taking a significant cut here, but I believe in putting this product in the right hands. What do you say?

Alice, thank you for your persistence and understanding. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $1,230,000 for the product. This price reflects both the value of the item and my budget constraints. I hope this proposal meets your needs.
